note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: A free, open source, power tool for working with messy data
body:
###Welcome to the new OpenRefine site

Google Refine is a power tool for working with messy data, cleaning it up, transforming it from one format into another, extending it with web services, and linking it to databases like [Freebase](http://www.freebase.com).

* [Downloads](http://code.google.com/p/google-refine/wiki/Downloads?tm=2) for Linux, Mac, and Windows
* [Documentation Wiki](https://github.com/OpenRefine/OpenRefine/wiki)
name: OpenRefine
